articles.author: Gian M. Volpicelli
articles.title: The Rise and Fall of a Bitcoin Mining Sensation
articles.description: Compass Mining grew quickly during crypto’s halcyon days. Now, its customers and their thousands of mining machines are stuck.
articles.content: It was 8:45 in the morning of June 13 when Bill Stewart, the CEO of Maine-based bitcoin mining business Dynamics Mining, received a call from one of his employees. He's like, Every machine inside of … [+3472 chars]

articles.author: Lily Hay Newman, Andy Greenberg
articles.title: Bitcoin Fog Case Could Put Cryptocurrency Tracing on Trial
articles.description: Roman Sterlingov, accused of laundering $336 million, is proclaiming his innocence—and challenging a key investigative tool.
articles.content: Tools to trace cryptocurrencies have, over just the last several years, allowed law enforcement agencies to convict dark web black market administrators, recover millions in ransomware payments, seiz… [+3510 chars]
